description: Monitor newly executed processes associated with account creation, such as net.exe Analytic 1 - Create local admin accounts using net.exe (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode="1") OR (source="*WinEventLog:Security" EventCode="4688") (Image= C:\Windows\System32\net.exe OR Image= C:\Windows\System32\net1.exe ) AND CommandLine = * -exportPFX * )
